modName: DawnStar Dark Brotherhood Hideout retrofit add on
summary: I been a elder scrolls fan for a long time and i like the dark brotherhood quests so i added a blacksmith Forge to the Dark brotherhood DawnStar Hideout
descriptionHtml:
I been a elder scrolls fan for a long time and i like the dark brotherhood quests so i added a blacksmiths Forge to the Dark brotherhood DawnStar Hideout.

Note: in screenshot i using a mod for weapon on back it not a part of the mod.

This is my first upload to this site I also planning to make some more dark Brotherhoods follower and weapons as well in the retrofit i add the forge because the first hideout had a place to make weapons and i miss it in the drawnstar hideout.

Version 1.0 
Add npc follower Called Black Widow and Benarl

Black widow kill her lover after her wedding day and found a love for killing she can be marry just keep in mind she cute but will kill you.

Benarl is a man who like to watch the live of the target fade away it said Benarl kill is wife and brother before joining the Dark Brotherhood. can marry

Add Npc Nightshade she in the mod but you cant talk to her i plan to make her a Store owner for the Nightmare Weapons so she a work in progress sorry

Version 1.2  

Made Nightshade a working Store owner 
Add new Npc J.Darkess-N737 Store Owner
New Race ShadowScale Added
A Book about the Npc call the Dark Brotherhood
New Lost Soul Npc Plan to Make Follower

v1.3

Change some chars armor
move forge further in 
Made Lost Soul a Follower
Added two new crafting stations
Now the Chars A I as been redone
Change J.Darkess-N737 from male to female



please forgive the spelling i have something wrong with me

simple put the file contain with the 7zip file into the data folder of your skyrim install folder
author: N737
